name: CONSUME (Brainloaf Studio)
description:
As a lone knight tasked with feeding an eternally hungry king, you have your work cut out for you. Scramble to forage and hunt enough food to last, and make a deal with the mysterious Poop Dealer if you dare...

Made for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "keep it alive." Good luck with that.

Move with the [arrow keys]. Attack or throw items with [Z]. Block or pick up items with [X]. Be sure to throw food towards the king's mouth to feed him, or into the furnace to cook.

Special cool kid moves: Charge attack by holding in [Z]. Mushrooms are bouncy.

Code by Joshua Edwards (@glenk_), art & animation by Cosmo Wegman (@crelishboy), backgrounds by Lulu Wegman (@enchilatte), and music by Aaron Weatherford (@atw_composer).
